import React, {useEffect,useState} from 'react' import logo from "../img/logo.png" import './Signup.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Signup = () => { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const postdata=()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:5000/signup",{ method:"post", headers:{ "Content-Type":"application/json" }, body:JSON.stringify({ name:name }) }) } return (

sign up to see your profile

{setEmail(e.target.value)}}/>
{setName(e.target.value)}}/>
{setUsername(e.target.value)}}/>
{setPassword(e.target.value)}}/>

by signing up,you agree to our terms,
privacy policy and cookies policy.

{postdata()}}/>
Already have an account ? Sign In
) } export default Signup
